bibl.title: Despatch from Judson A. Lewis to John Hay
Despatches from U.S. Consuls in Sierra Leone, British Africa, 1858-1906

div1.p: No. 44. U.S. Consulate at Sierra Leone Jan 27th 1881.
Judson A. Lewis To Dept. State
Received Dept Dispatch No 21. also Commercial Regulations Oct. also 10 Copies Circular for Preventing Collisions at Sea.

No 44. U.S. Consulate at
Sierra Leone Jan 27th 1881.

Hon John Hay
Ass't Secty of State
Washington D.C.
I have to acknowledge the receipt of Department Dispatch No. 21. Dated Dec. 16th 1880.
I also have to acknowledge the receipt of Ten (10) copies of Commercial Relations No 1. Oct. 1880.
Also Ten (10) copies of Circular dated Oct. 5th 1880. Regulations for Preventing Collisions at Sea.

I am Sir
Your Obt Servt
Judson A. Lewis
U.S. Consul
